Question
========

Below you see variables in a study of physical fitness. Determine which random variable X is a continuous variable:_____________. \ I The subject is male or female, X = the number of females. II After every 30 minutes, a along trainer comes to whom you ask to measure your effort. X = the number of times the trainer comes by per day. III You measure the V-O~2~, the maximum oxygen consumption per minute during exercise. X = the number of liters of oxygen consumption per minute.

Answerlist
----------

* I is a continuous random variable.
* II is a continuous random variable.
* III is a continuous random variable.
* I and II are continuous random variables.
* II and III are continuous random variables.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* I is a continuous random variable...: Incorrect
* II is a continuous random variable...: Incorrect
* III is a continuous random variable...: Correct
* I and II are continuous random variables...: Incorrect
* II and III are continuous random variables...: Incorrect
